programme.title: Jab We Met
programme.desc: The life of a suicidal industrialist takes a sharp turn when he meets a spirited chatterbox on a train journey in this breezy Bollywood romantic comedy.

programme.title: Ram Avtar
programme.desc: Ram and Avtar are both childhood best friends. The difference between the two friends is that Ram would willingly make priceless sacrifice for his friend; the time when both are separated is when Ram goes abroad to further his studies. In the mean while Avtar takes up employment in an organization run by Sangeeta. Avtar is romantically attracted to Sangeeta but Sangeeta falls in love with Ram; when Ram gets to know that Avtar is in love with Sangeeta he decides to sacrifice his love for his friend sake by getting Avtar married to Sangeeta. But one of Sangeeta's enemies Gundappaswami is willing to expose Ram and Sangeeta's relationship to Avtar.

programme.title: Firaaq
programme.desc: Inspired from the 2002 violence in Gujarat, this drama follows the lives of different people directly or indirectly affected by the riots, from a compassionate woman in an orthodox Gujarati family living with a stone-hearted husband, an urban cross-culture couple with a Hindu wife and a Muslim husband, a poor Muslim couple whose house is charred to ashes during the riots to an old Muslim singer. As their stories unfold and intertwine, we see the harrowing picture of the repercussions of violence in society.

programme.title: Love Shagun
programme.desc: JD must battle astrological problems surrounding his marriage, his mothers incessant nagging, and his friends advising him on relationships in order to find an ideal life partner.

programme.title: SP Chauhan: A Struggling Man
programme.desc: This biopic traces the journey of Thakur Satpal Chauhan, a heroic social worker from Haryana who braved adverse social conditions to promote women's empowerment and an alcohol-free society.

programme.title: Guns of Banaras
programme.desc: A sincere and diligent young man, Guddu, is very attached to his bike since it became his streak of luck. One day, when his bike gets stolen, Guddu sets out to find it but gets entangled in the world of crime when he finds out that his bike is being used to transport drugs.

programme.title: Ishqiya
programme.desc: Khalujaan and Babban, two thugs, are on the run from their boss. They seek refuge at an old friendâ€™s house but meet Krishna, his widow, instead. Both of them fall for her, oblivious to the fact that Krishna is manipulating them for her own gain.

programme.title: Ajab Prem Ki Ghazab Kahani
programme.desc: Prem, a free-spirited boy, falls in love with a young girl Jenny. However, when he learns that she is in love with her college sweetheart, Rahul, Prem sacrifices his love and helps Jenny to get married to the love of her life.
